2.explanation: Implements the fast-path and slow-path logic for the JS + (Add) operation in IC / builtin stubs. Handles Smi+Smi (TrySmiAdd), HeapNumber addition (Float64Add), string concatenation via StringAdd builtin, BigInt fast 64-bit ops and full BigInt fallback via Builtin::kBigIntAddNoThrow. On each path it computes a Smi feedback value (BinaryOperationFeedback::kSignedSmall/kNumber/kString/kBigInt/kAny etc) and calls UpdateFeedback with maybe_feedback_vector and slot_id. Calls Builtin::kAdd for generic cases.
